article_metadata.description: MONTICELLO - Marlon Baksh doesn’t usually ask people for help with his taxes because he mostly does his own.But this year, Baksh, 54, of Kiamesha Lake must pay a penalty on his taxes because he doesn’t have health insurance, as the Affordable Care Act mandates. So he enlisted the help of a Monticello High School senior, Juan Diaz, to double-check his tax returns to make sure he doesn’t overpay the government.In the end, Baksh was pleased to see his initial calculations of a
article_metadata.author: ANDREW BEAM Times Herald-Record
